dialogue: A decrepit looking man with sunken eyes stood before you.
Noblesse Regent Aziraphale
By the time I found out about the Kijohime's little experiment, you had already left the city.
Noblesse Regent Aziraphale
I refuse to play into the Kijohime's schemes. However, you rescued our Avant-Courier. There's merit in that. And not even I can deny your strength now
Noblesse Regent Aziraphale
I will send you to the northern continent, but at the cost of a favour.
Noblesse Regent Aziraphale
I need you and Beatrix to go to the Guar Caverns and retrieve the Blue Lacrima that lies deep within it.
Noblesse Regent Aziraphale
See, you're excellent at following orders. I already like you more than the Kijohime.
The Regent raised a single outstretched hand, then lowered it without another word
Noblesse Regent Aziraphale
It's not the place of dogs to ask of their master's ambition.
Noblesse Regent Aziraphale
Just as you wordlessly followed the Kijohime's order, wordlessly follow mine.
Noblesse Regent Aziraphale
They summoned you with a brain, correct? Ask around.
A decrepit looking man with sunken eyes stood before you.
Noblesse Regent Aziraphale
By the time I found out about the Kijohime's little experiment, you had already left the city.
Noblesse Regent Aziraphale
I refuse to play into the Kijohime's schemes, but not even I can deny your strength now
Noblesse Regent Aziraphale
I cannot send you to the northern continent as is, the current state of the city is too unstable.
Noblesse Regent Aziraphale
I need you to prove your loyalty and power by finding and defeating the Ashura Royal Karura.
A decrepit looking man with sunken eyes stood before you.
Noblesse Regent Aziraphale
I'm impressed. You're as strong as I'd expected.
Noblesse Regent Aziraphale
However, I need one more thing before I can truly settle this war.
Noblesse Regent Aziraphale
I will send you to the northern continent, but first, I need you to go to the Guar Caverns and retrieve the Blue Lacrima that lies deep within it.
